definitions: from or in connection with living matter
shortDefinitions: from or in connection with living matter

definitions: without the use of chemical fertilizers, pesticides, or other artificial chemicals

examples.text: incentives offered to farmers to farm organically

shortDefinitions: without use of chemical fertilizers, pesticides, or other artificial chemicals

definitions: in a way that relates to a bodily organ or organs

examples.text: it's not a definable illness; there is nothing organically wrong

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to bodily organ or organs

definitions: as elements of an organized whole

examples.text: workers in both parts of the new economy are organically connected
little subplots which fit organically into the overall picture

definitions: in the course of gradual or natural development

examples.text: the market grew organically from its modest beginnings

shortDefinitions: in course of gradual or natural development
